content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"　可能性は少しでも高い方がいいだすからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's best if the chances are even slightly higher.\""},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"　裸族王バファムーンＶＳミルキー・トー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Naked Tribe King Bafamoon VS Milky Toe\""},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞・モフスＶＳ魔女リクチェル」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Yell> Mofusu VS Witch Rikucheru\""},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"１０２シナリオテストｄｆｄｆｄｆな橋、","translatedEnglishLine":"102 Scenario Test dfd fdf Bridge,"},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"天満橋。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tenman Bridge."},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんな集合ー、ってね☆","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone, gather up— you know☆"},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呼ばれちゃったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Once we're called,"},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相手がヤベーとか言ってらんないね」","translatedEnglishLine":"we can't just say the enemy's scary."},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah."},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスを守るのを、人任せにはできないしね」","translatedEnglishLine":"We can't leave protecting Zeth to others."},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………うい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……しょっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ngh... Hup...!\""},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クッ、ぬるいわ、ッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, that's weak...!\""},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"フルスイングの一撃を、触腕の一本が弾き返す。","translatedEnglishLine":"One of the tentacles deflected the full-swing blow."},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"「セスナ、下がっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Setsuna, fall back...!\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"豪腕が唸り、セスナの軽い身体が","translatedEnglishLine":"A mighty arm roared, and Setsuna's light body"},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"受けたハンマーごと転がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"rolled over along with the hammer she wielded."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おらおらおらおらおら！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ora ora ora ora ora!"},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一斉射撃、ありったけだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Full volley, give it everything you've got!\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……今度は、当たる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...This time, it hits.\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはう、っ……あ、あーー、おごっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahau... ah, aahh, oof...\""},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"全身を使って遠心力を生み出した渾身の一撃が、","translatedEnglishLine":"A powerful blow fueled by centrifugal force from the entire body,"},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"茫洋と立ち尽くすツォトンの身体を砕く。","translatedEnglishLine":"shattered the body of Tsoton, who stood aimlessly."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だー！　無茶するなって！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn! Don't be reckless!\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこ、まだ毒！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's still poisoned there!\""},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、終わった終わったー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, it's over, it's over."},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たまにガチでやるとしんどいわ。プリマー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Doing it seriously once in a while is tough, Prima.\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい次、動けない人連れてきな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright next, bring those who can't move!"},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちゃちゃっと手当てして、脱出するよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Quickly treat them and let's get out of here!\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………構えこらーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Get ready—!\""},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあぁ、メガデス！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, Megadeath!?\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、後にしろ後にーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, leave it for later, later—!\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ぐう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ugh.\""},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんにちはー……あれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hello there... huh?\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、いらっしゃい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, welcome.\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ウルザさんに頼まれて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ulza-san asked me to,"},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"　届け物……に来たんだけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"deliver something... so I came.\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、ランスじゃーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, it's Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おー、プリマにメガデスか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Prima and Megadeath, huh."},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また懐かしい顔だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Another familiar face.\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「モロミちゃんって呼べッつってんだろ☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I told you to call me Moromi-chan☆\""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ、お久しぶりです、お二人とも！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, it's been a while, both of you!\""},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、シィルちゃんだーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, it's Seel-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なーんか氷から抜けたんだって？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard you just got out of the ice or something?\""},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ね、お祝いしよしよ☆","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, let's celebrate☆"},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人でお酒とかー……☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"Drinking together or something...☆\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待たんかこのレズ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait a minute, you lesbians.\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーんだよー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What the heck."},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女の子同士の友情を邪魔すんなよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't ruin the friendship between girls.\""},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前のは友情じゃないだろうが！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yours isn't friendship though!\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じょーだんじょーだん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just kidding, just kidding."},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスの反応が面白ぇからさー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I just find Rance's reaction funny.\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アイスフレームのお二人……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The two from Ice Flame..."},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お元気そうで何よりですだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Glad to see you both well.\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんうん。いつもあのふたり……と。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah. Always those two... and."},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういえばセスナちゃんは？」","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, what about Setsuna-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、セスナは別件。というか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Setsuna has another matter. Or rather,"},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あたしひとりで来る予定だったんだけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"I was supposed to come alone but...\""},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「旦那の安全を守るのは嫁の義務っしょ☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"Protecting your husband's safety is a wife's duty☆\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可能性は少しでも高い方がいいだすからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's best if the chances are even slightly higher."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸族王バファムーンＶＳミルキー・トー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Naked Tribe King Bafamoon VS Milky Toe"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフスＶＳ魔女リクチェル」
相手がヤベーとか言ってらんないね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we can't just say the enemy's scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを守るのを、人任せにはできないしね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't leave protecting Zeth to others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フルスイングの一撃を、触腕の一本が弾き返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One of the tentacles deflected the full-swing blow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 豪腕が唸り、セスナの軽い身体が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mighty arm roared, and Setsuna's light body

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 受けたハンマーごと転がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rolled over along with the hammer she wielded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一斉射撃、ありったけだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Full volley, give it everything you've got!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身を使って遠心力を生み出した渾身の一撃が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A powerful blow fueled by centrifugal force from the entire body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 茫洋と立ち尽くすツォトンの身体を砕く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shattered the body of Tsoton, who stood aimlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、終わった終わったー。
たまにガチでやるとしんどいわ。プリマー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doing it seriously once in a while is tough, Prima."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい次、動けない人連れてきな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright next, bring those who can't move!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃちゃっと手当てして、脱出するよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quickly treat them and let's get out of here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、後にしろ後にーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, leave it for later, later—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 届け物……に来たんだけど」
「モロミちゃんって呼べッつってんだろ☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I told you to call me Moromi-chan☆"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、お久しぶりです、お二人とも！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, it's been a while, both of you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんか氷から抜けたんだって？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard you just got out of the ice or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子同士の友情を邪魔すんなよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't ruin the friendship between girls."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前のは友情じゃないだろうが！」
ランスの反応が面白ぇからさー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just find Rance's reaction funny."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お元気そうで何よりですだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Glad to see you both well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うんうん。いつもあのふたり……と。
そういえばセスナちゃんは？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, what about Setsuna-chan?"
"Ah, Setsuna has another matter. Or rather,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あたしひとりで来る予定だったんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was supposed to come alone but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「旦那の安全を守るのは嫁の義務っしょ☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protecting your husband's safety is a wife's duty☆"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
